title: Cannot add new topics to the discovery page
content:
So at the moment I am trying to add new topics to my discovery page and I am currently unable to. I have done this before and even been able to search what I wanted to have shown but now I can't find it anywhere! And when I go into the customise section they only give me selections rather the option to search. Wether this is a new to the phone I don't know but it's just pretty annoying if anything.

Thanks heaps!
- James
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
